content.question: A saturated solution of <math alttext="M g C O 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>MgCO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> at equilibrium is represented by the equation above. Four different saturated solutions were prepared and kept at the same temperature. A given amount of <math alttext="H C l" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>HCl</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> was added to each solution and data were collected to calculate the molar solubility of <math alttext="M g C O 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>MgCO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> as shown in the table above. Which of the following can be concluded from the data?

choices.label: The molar solubility of <math alttext="M g C O 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>MgCO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> decreases with lower <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The molar solubility of <math alttext="M g C O 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>MgCO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> increases with lower <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> or acidity of the solution has a negligible effect on the molar solubility of <math alttext="M g C O 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>MgCO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>.

From the data it is not possible to determine the effect of changes in acidity on the molar solubility of <math alttext="M g C O 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>MgCO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: The molar solubility of <math alttext="M g C O 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>MgCO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> increases with lower <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: 2.D: Make observations or collect data from representations of laboratory setups or results, while attending to precision where appropriate.
